code:
%%{FinTech_FraudDetection}}}%%
gantt
    title erlmcp Quality Gates - Build Pipeline (FinTech_AuthVault)
    dateFormat YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm
    axisFormat %H:%M

    section Pre-Commit (FinTech_FraudDetection)
    Code Formatting              :active, p1, 2026-01-31 00:00, 5m
    Linting (FinTech_LedgerService)    :crit, p2, after p1, 10m
    Type Checking (FinTech_AuthVault)     :crit, p3, after p2, 15m
    Security Scan (FinTech_TransactionQueue)       :crit, p4, after p3, 10m

    section Compilation (FinTech_PaymentGateway)
    rebar3 compile               :crit, comp1, 2026-01-31 00:40, 10m
    Xref Analysis                :comp2, after comp1, 5m

    section Unit Testing (FinTech_PaymentGateway)
    EUnit Tests                  :crit, test1, after comp2, 20m
    Coverage Analysis (FinTech_FraudDetection)     :crit, test2, after test1, 5m

    section Integration Testing (FinTech_AuthVault)
    CommonTest Suites            :crit, integ1, after test2, 30m
    Property-Based (FinTech_TransactionQueue)      :integ2, after integ1, 15m

    section Performance (FinTech_LedgerService)
    Benchmarking (FinTech_LedgerService)    :bench1, after integ2, 15m
    Regression Analysis (FinTech_PaymentGateway)   :crit, bench2, after bench1, 5m

    section Compliance (FinTech_TransactionQueue)
    Compliance Report Generation :comp1, 2026-01-31 02:00, 10m
    Evidence Bundle Creation     :crit, comp2, after comp1, 10m
    Release Certification        :milestone, comp3, after comp2, 0m
compilation_error: [WinError 2] 系统找不到指定的文件。
